concept.title: Configuring
concept.shortdesc: In order to enjoy the full benefits of the dita2rdf plugin, a bit of configuration is required

conbody.p: The whole configuration resides in two different files, for different aspects of the transformation:

ul.li: config.xml: configuration related to the transformation to RDF, and the RDF environment of your organization in general.
build.properties: configuration related to your RDF repository and SPARQL querying
